name: SXZ Raiden (Metal Gear Rising)
description:
Trained on NAI with clip skip 2, so it should work pretty fine with any anime-based model.

You also may use slight adjustments in prompt like athletic, muscular male to increase strength of embedding. Rarely you also may need such prompt as one-eyed, eyepatch, cyborg ninja, cybernetic jaw

Also this negative prompt may be helpful teeth, kid, child, girl

meta.prompt: 1boy, athletic, muscular, sxz-mgr-v1-4000 holding sword, running through military base, angry smirk, dynamic pose, covered in blood, one-eyed, (detailed background), military base, (lens distortion:0,7), (chromatic aberration:0.7), (fim grain:0.7), intricate, unreal engine 5, volumetric lighting, realistic, cinematic, 4k, cinematic lighting, depth of field, masterpiece, perfect, hyper-detailed, hard lighting, intricate details, stop motion, hyperfocus, tonemapping, sharp focus, hyper detailed  <hypernet:sxz-snyderstyle-800:0.6>
meta.negativePrompt: (bad_prompt_version2:0.7), bad-hands-5, (loli), child, kid, anime, asian, african, cartoon, low quality, close up, old, lowres, text, error, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, blurry, black and white, monochrome, censored, (out of frame:1.3), (fat), ((overexposed)), simple background, teeth
